newsitem.title: USA: Sports Authority to offer $150 mln in notes.
newsitem.headline: Sports Authority to offer $150 mln in notes.

text.p: Sports Authority Inc said Tuesday it was issuing $149.5 million worth of convertible subordinated notes to repay debt and finance the acquisition and development of new stores.
The company said it was offering the 5.25-percent notes due September 15, 2001 to institutional buyers in a private placement.
The closing of the issue is expected by September 20, it said.
The company said the notes would be convertible into common stock at a conversion price of $32.635 per share.
Its stock closed at $26 on the New York Stock Exchange on Tuesday.
